other_details: The script requires a specific version of DALES, which is specified by the variable TAG.
The number of tasks in the x and y directions are specified by the variables NX and NY.
The script uses the SLURM workload manager to manage the resources.
The script uses the FFTW library for fast Fourier transforms.
The script uses the netCDF-Fortran library for data I/O.
The script uses the CMake build system to build DALES.
The script uses the Hypre library for parallel linear algebra.
The script requires access to a scratch directory for storing temporary files.
